name: Hyper-Trace
description:
In the year 3241...

The intergalactic space war has left our fleet crippled by enemy spies. An attack on our central control database has removed critical navigation charts used by our star cruisers. You have been recruited to manually guide our ships to the enemy targets in as few hyperjumps as possible. We must be efficient in our planning if we are to have any hope in this fight!

Controls

Use the mouse to drag and rotate the planning grid. Your currently assigned starship is shown as a yellow arrow. Available starsystems appear as blue orbs. Hover over an orb to add it to the planning tree.

Your objective is to expand the planning tree to reach the red enemy target. You will be judged on how many unnecessary star systems you had to explore.

Credits

Created for the CoMo Game Jam VII on May 29-31 2020.

Design: Drew Buck

Music: "Outer Apace Air Space" by Mutki
